sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {getFullName, getPersonAge} from "../../../../Common Functions/PersonFunctions"; const EmployeeBio = ({setEmployeeInfo,employee}) => { const { id, person: {personName: name, mobileNumber, village, dateOfBirth, gender,socialNumber}, } = employee; return (

{getFullName(name)}

{dateOfBirth}
{setEmployeeInfo(false)}} >Edit Delete
Age
{getPersonAge(dateOfBirth)}
Village
{village===null?"---":village}
Mobile Number
{mobileNumber}
Gender
{gender===true?"Female":"Male"}
Social Number
{socialNumber}
{/*details*/}
); }; export default EmployeeBio;
